title: Bug 17423: Revert Appears Twice in the Popup Menu
description: There are two 'Revert' options in the menu.
OB: Two 'Revert' options are visible in the popup menu.
EB: Only one 'Revert' option should appear in the popup menu.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the main menu.
2. Right-click to open the popup menu.
3. Observe the presence of two 'Revert' options in the menu.
